verses.text: Then the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w* against \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Forasmuch as I \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* thee out of the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, and \w made|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w prince|strong="H5057"\w* over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and thou hast \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, and hast made my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, to provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*;

Behold, I will take \w away|strong="H1197"\w* the \w posterity|strong="H0310"\w* of \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w*, and the \w posterity|strong="H0310"\w* of his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w* like the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*.

Him that \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w* of \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall the \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; and him that \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w* of his in the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* shall the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w air|strong="H8064"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w*, and what he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, and his \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

So \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*: and \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

And also by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w* came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* against \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w*, and against his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, even for all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, in provoking him to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, in being like the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*; and because he \w killed|strong="H5221"\w* him.

¶ In the \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w sixth|strong="H8337"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* began \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*, two \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w*, \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \add his\add* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against him, as he was in \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*, \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* himself \w drunk|strong="H7910"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Arza|strong="H0777"\w* steward of \add his\add* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*.\f + \fr 16.9 \ft steward…: Heb. which was over\f*

And \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, and \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* him, in the \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

¶ And it came to pass, when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, as soon as he \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* on his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \add that\add* he \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w*: he \w left|strong="H7604"\w* him not one that \w pisseth|strong="H8366"\w* against a \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, neither of his \w kinsfolks|strong="H1350"\w*, nor of his \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*.\f + \fr 16.11 \ft neither…: or, both his kinsmen and his friends\f*

Thus did \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w*, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* against \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*,\f + \fr 16.12 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*

For all the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w*, and the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, by which they \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and by which they made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, in provoking the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with their \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

¶ In the \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* did \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add were\add* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* against \w Gibbethon|strong="H1405"\w*, which \add belonged\add* to the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that were\add* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w* hath \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w*, and hath also \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: wherefore all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* made \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w*, the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

And \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Gibbethon|strong="H1405"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, and they \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*, that he \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w palace|strong="H0759"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* over him with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w died|strong="H4191"\w*,

For his \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* which he \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* in \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in \w walking|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, and in his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, to make \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w*, and his \w treason|strong="H7195"\w* that he \w wrought|strong="H7194"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

¶ Then were the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* into two \w parts|strong="H2677"\w*: \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w followed|strong="H1961"\w* \w Tibni|strong="H8402"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ginath|strong="H1527"\w*, to make him \w king|strong="H4427"\w*; and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w*.

But the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H2388"\w* \w against|strong="H0854"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w Tibni|strong="H8402"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ginath|strong="H1527"\w*: so \w Tibni|strong="H8402"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w*.

¶ In the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* began \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* he in \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*.

And he \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* of \w Shemer|strong="H8106"\w* for two \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w built|strong="H1129"\w* on the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* which he \w built|strong="H1129"\w*, after the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Shemer|strong="H8106"\w*, \w owner|strong="H0113"\w* of the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*, \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.\f + \fr 16.24 \ft Samaria: Heb. Shomeron\f*

¶ But \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and did \w worse|strong="H7489"\w* than all that \add were\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

For he \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in all the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, and in his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* wherewith he made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, to provoke the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with their \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, and his \w might|strong="H1369"\w* that he \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

So \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*: and \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

¶ And in the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w eighth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* began \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* above all that \add were\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

And it came to pass, as if it had been a light \w thing|strong="H7043"\w* for him to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, that he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Ethbaal|strong="H0856"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Zidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* him.\f + \fr 16.31 \ft as if…: Heb. was it a light thing, etc\f*

And he reared \w up|strong="H6965"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* for \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, which he had \w built|strong="H1129"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w grove|strong="H0842"\w*; and \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* to provoke the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* than all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that were \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

¶ In his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* did \w Hiel|strong="H2419"\w* the \w Beth-elite|strong="H1017"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*: he laid the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* thereof in \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w* his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, and set \w up|strong="H5324"\w* the \w gates|strong="H1817"\w* thereof in his \w youngest|strong="H6810"\w* \add son\add* \w Segub|strong="H7687"\w*, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*.
